name: jangid-platform
description: Yellow pages portal with wildcard subdomains, admin dashboards, and Vue 3 frontend

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @jangid/shared && npm run build --workspace @jangid/api && npm run build --workspace @jangid/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace @jangid/api && npm run lint --workspace @jangid/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace @jangid/api && npm run typecheck --workspace @jangid/web
